articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
Last week the @ArweaveTeam ecosystem launched 6 new tools and protocols:
- Vouch Protocol
- VouchDAO
- Stamps
- StampCoin
- Programmably Exchangable Tokens
- burntAR
Here's a quick overview of what was launched and how these tools and protocols work: 🧵
Arweave Team: 6 huge innovations are launching in the Arweave ecosystem today.
Together, these new services will bootstrap the web of value on the permaweb, leading to a web where all content is natively exchangeable, and monetizable (without ads).
🚀 Strap in. This is gonna get wild. 👇

articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢
Thrilled to announce Modular Fellows - a 3 month program for developers, builders, and researchers interested in building on modular blockchain networks like Celestia! 🏕️
I'll be driving this program and working directly with participants. Applications are now open.
Celestia: Today, we’re excited to announce Modular Fellows, a new program that supports and mentors modular builders.
 https://blog.celestia.org/introducing-modular-fellows/

If you're in SF, we got a thing happening 👀
Know that feeling when you have a project or idea, but, it's just hard to actually get that spark to go for it? We got you.
Web3 SF is going down -- Aug 26 - 27.
Day 1: Talks + inspo.
Day 2: Get the fk off localhost.
100% free.
